text: sachche eemaanadaar to sirph vah log hain jo khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan lae aur jab kisee aise kaam ke lie jisamen longon ke jama hone kee zarurat hai- rasool ke paas hote hain jab tak usase ijaazat na le lee na gae (ai rasool) jo log tum se (har baat mein) ijaazat le lete hain ve hee log (dil se) khuda aur usake rasool par eemaan lae hain to jab ye log apane kisee kaam ke lie tum se ijaazat maangen to tum unamen se jisako (munaasib khyaal karake) chaaho ijaazat de diya karo aur khuda use usakee bakhshis kee dua bhee karo beshak khuda bada bakhshane vaala meharabaan hai
